member.name: T:Gravity.Gravitator
member.summary: This component will gravitate other objects based on it's configuration.

member.name: M:Gravity.Gravitator.GravitateAll
member.summary: This function attracts all RigidBodies that are in a list of RigidBodies towards this GameObject. This code is heavily based on a Unity3D Wiki page.

member.name: P:Gravity.Gravitator.Range
member.summary: The maximum range at which this object will gravitate other objects.

member.name: P:Gravity.Gravitator.ForceMultiplier
member.summary: The amount with which the gravitational force is multiplied with.

member.name: P:Gravity.Gravitator.GravitationType
member.summary: The type of gravitation that will be caused by this object.

member.name: T:Gravity.InputManager
member.summary: This component receives user input and performs actions based on the input.

member.name: M:Gravity.InputManager.CreateBall(Duality.Vector2)
member.summary: This function creates a Ball object using the Ball prefab assigned in this component, and places it at a specified position.
member.param: The location the Ball object is to be placed at.

member.name: M:Gravity.InputManager.CreateGravitator(Duality.Vector2)
member.summary: This function creates a Gravitator object using the Gravitator prefab assigned in this component, and places it at a specified position.
member.param: The location the Gravitator object is to be placed at.

member.name: P:Gravity.InputManager.BallPrefab
member.summary: The prefab used to create a new Ball object.

member.name: P:Gravity.InputManager.GravitatorPrefab
member.summary: The prefab used to create a new Gravitator object.
